means: 斜眼看，飞媚眼( leer的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Men were standing around, swilling beer and occasionally leering at passing females.
sentence.Network_cn: 男人们吊儿郎当地站着，大口大口地喝着啤酒，偶尔还对着路过的女性猥亵地笑。

sentence.Network_en: She could see only outrage and humiliation, leering at her, mocking her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她看见那个奇耻大辱就站在她的面前, 带着狞笑看她, 讥笑她.

sentence.Network_en: The invitation was plain, but not leering.
sentence.Network_cn: 这邀请的用意显而易见, 不过说得并不轻佻.

PerfectNetExp.abs: leering drugstore cowboys ., 暗送秋波的杂货店牛仔.

list.abs: 代哲学家Umberto Eco看待「符号」如「空的位置」（leere Stelle），要看是什麽东西放进去它便成为怎样的符号。
翻译网内容 - Powered by Discuz! ... lacquer ware 漆器 leer at 不怀好意地看着(表示情欲或恶意) limneticadj. 淡水的.
2006年1月29日 -  leere Haubitzengranaten 空榴弹炮 das U-2-Aufkl rungsflugzeug U-2侦察机 der Anthrax炭疽 das Nervengas神经毒气 eine Zehn-Punkte-Erkl rung十.

entry.tran: 不怀好意地笑；猥亵地笑；淫笑
entry.def: If someone leers at you, they smile in an unpleasant way, usually because they are sexually interested in you.

example.ex: Men were standing around, swilling beer and occasionally leering at passing females...
example.tran: 男人们吊儿郎当地站着，大口大口地喝着啤酒，偶尔还对着路过的女性猥亵地笑。

example.ex: He looked back at Kenworthy and leered.
example.tran: 他回头看了看肯沃西，色迷迷地笑了。

means.word_mean: 1. showing sly or knowing malice in a glance;

sentences.sentence: "she had run in fear of...his evil leering eye"- Amy Lowell

means.word_mean: 2. (of a glance) sidelong and slyly lascivious;

auth_sentence.content: Borgnine and Lee Marvin are the leering thugs whose presence is a tacit threat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Borgnine and Lee Marvin are the leering thugs whose presence is a tacit threat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Borgnine and Lee Marvin are the leering thugs whose presence is a tacit threat.
